full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 50 of 247 178 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct 1 THE COURT: Thank you. 2 MS. COMEY: And your Honor, we have a hard copy for the Court, if that would be useful. 3 THE COURT: That would help. Thank you. 4 MS. COMEY: May Ms. Drescher approach? 5 THE COURT: Please. 6 And you've asked, Ms. Comey, to turn to again? 7 MS. COMEY: Government Exhibit 12, your Honor. 8 THE COURT: Okay. 9 So please just turn to Government Exhibit 12. 10 Everybody there? Not yet. 11 MS. COMEY: I see a hand from a juror. 12 THE COURT: You need glasses. We're going to get them. Hang on a second. Ms. Williams will ask you where she can find them for you. Just a moment. 13 Members of the jury, please don't turn to other exhibits until expressly instructed, but you may look at Government Exhibit 12 in the binder. 14 (Pause) 15 THE COURT: Thank you, Ms. Williams. GX-12. 16 MS. COMEY: Yes. Thank you, your Honor. 17 BY MS. COMEY: 18 Q. Now, Mr. Visoski, without saying the name out loud, would you please look at the first and last name on this exhibit. 19 A. Yes. 20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017412
